Body: Possible Duplicate:  How to hide updates from market?  I've been using a certain app for some time now, but according to the many 1-star reviews the latest "update" has got, it breaks compatibility with Tasker, which is not something I want.Is there a way to at least temporarily remove the regular update notifications I receive, or stop the app appearing at the top of my update list every time?Using Nexus S with official 4.0.3.
Title: Is it possible to permanently supress app updates?

history.Text: I've been using a certain app for some time now, but according to the many 1-star reviews the latest "update" has got, it breaks compatibility with Tasker, which is not something I want.Is there a way to at least temporarily remove the regular update notifications I receive, or stop the app appearing at the top of my update list every time?
Is it possible to permanently supress app updates?

I've been using a certain app for some time now, but according to the many 1-star reviews the latest "update" has got, it breaks compatibility with Tasker, which is not something I want.Is there a way to at least temporarily remove the regular update notifications I receive, or stop the app appearing at the top of my update list every time?Using Nexus S with official 4.0.3.
